price: Vërtet, Allahu është me ata që e kanë frikë dhe që janë punëmirë.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَواْ وَّٱلَّذِينَ هُم مُّحۡسِنُونَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha maʿa alladhīna ittaqaw wa-alladhīna hum muḥ'sinūna
